text: Amy Lee Grant (November 25, 1960) is an American singer and songwriter. She is known for her Contemporary Christian music, as well as pop music hits. Grant is the best-selling contemporary Christian music singer ever. She released her first album in 1977 at the age of 16. ==Early life== Grant was born in Augusta, Georgia.Amy, Grant (2007). Mosaic: Pieces of My Life So Far. title: Amy Grant
